languages.text: {n}Паскаль обнажает запястье. Под бледной, забывшей вкус солнца кожей переливаются зеленоватые светящиеся нити электрической татуировки.{/n} "Эта электу свидетельствует, что я являюсь {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магосом{/g}, допущенным к таинствам многих сфер знания и имеющим право проводить служение в соборе-кузне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль обнажает запястье. Под бледной, забывшей вкус солнца кожей переливаются зеленоватые светящиеся нити.{/n} "Это — моя электу, электрическая татуировка. Она сообщит всякому просвещенному механизму, что я являюсь {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магосом{/g} Адептус Механикус, допущенным к таинствам многих сфер знания. В рядах своего братства я являюсь уважаемым мастером, имеющим право проводить служение в соборе-кузне".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal exposes his wrist. The glowing green threads of an electric tattoo run under the pale skin that has long forgotten the taste of sunlight.{/n} "This electoo indicates that I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} who has mastered the sacraments of many spheres of knowledge and has the right to conduct services in a forge-cathedral."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль обнажает запястье. Под бледной, забывшей вкус солнца кожей переливаются зеленоватые светящиеся нити электрической татуировки.{/n} "Эта электу свидетельствует, что я являюсь {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}магосом{/g}, допущенным к таинствам многих сфер знания и имеющим право проводить служение в соборе-кузне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal reveals his wrist. There are glowing green threads running under the pale skin that had long forgotten the taste of sunlight.{/n} "This is my electoo, or an electric tattoo. It will inform any enlightened mechanism that I am an Adeptus Mechanicus {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} who mastered the sacraments of many spheres of knowledge. In my fraternity I am a high-ranking member in good standing who has the right to conduct services in a Forge cathedral."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pascal reveals his wrist. traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal te enseña la muñeca. Las luminosas hebras verdes de un tatuaje eléctrico discurren bajo una piel pálida que olvidó hace mucho tiempo la caricia del sol.{/n} «Este electoo me identifica como un {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} que ha dominado los sacramentos de muchas esferas de conocimiento y está legitimado a oficiar servicios en una catedral-forja».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exposes his wrist. The glowing green threads of an electric tattoo run under the pale skin that has long forgotten the taste of sunlight.{/n} "This electoo indicates that I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} who has mastered the sacraments of many spheres of knowledge and has the right to conduct services in a forge-cathedral."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal te enseña la muñeca. Las luminosas hebras verdes de un tatuaje eléctrico discurren bajo una piel pálida que olvidó hace mucho tiempo la caricia del sol.{/n} «Este electoo me identifica como un {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} que ha dominado los sacramentos de muchas esferas de conocimiento y está legitimado a oficiar servicios en una catedral-forja».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは手首を露わにした。長い間日の目を見ていない青白い肌の下に、緑色に輝く電子タトゥーが刻まれている。{/n}「このエレクトゥーは、私がさまざまな幅広い知識を習熟した{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}賢人{/g}であり、鍛冶大聖堂で礼拝を執り行う権利を持つことを示している」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exposes his wrist. The glowing green threads of an electric tattoo run under the pale skin that has long forgotten the taste of sunlight.{/n} "This electoo indicates that I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} who has mastered the sacraments of many spheres of knowledge and has the right to conduct services in a forge-cathedral."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは手首を露わにした。長い間日の目を見ていない青白い肌の下に、緑色に輝く電子タトゥーが刻まれている。{/n}「このエレクトゥーは、私がさまざまな幅広い知識を習熟した{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}賢人{/g}であり、鍛冶大聖堂で礼拝を執り行う権利を持つことを示している」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡露出他的手腕。久不见光的苍白皮肤上，铭刻着发光的绿色电子纹身。{/n}“这个电镀体表明我是一位{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}，掌握了许多知识领域的圣礼，并有权服务于铸造大教堂。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exposes his wrist. The glowing green threads of an electric tattoo run under the pale skin that has long forgotten the taste of sunlight.{/n} "This electoo indicates that I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} who has mastered the sacraments of many spheres of knowledge and has the right to conduct services in a forge-cathedral."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡露出他的手腕。久不见光的苍白皮肤上，铭刻着发光的绿色电子纹身。{/n}“这个电镀体表明我是一位{g|Encyclopedia:Magos}贤者{/g}，掌握了许多知识领域的圣礼，并有权服务于铸造大教堂。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal dévoile son poignet. Les motifs verts et luisants d'un tatouage électrique courent sous sa peau blafarde qui a depuis longtemps oublié la caresse du soleil.{/n} « Cet électrotatouage indique que je suis un {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} maîtrisant les sacrements de nombreuses sphères de connaissance et dûment autorisé à présider aux cérémonies d'une cathédrale-forge. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exposes his wrist. The glowing green threads of an electric tattoo run under the pale skin that has long forgotten the taste of sunlight.{/n} "This electoo indicates that I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} who has mastered the sacraments of many spheres of knowledge and has the right to conduct services in a forge-cathedral."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal dévoile son poignet. Les motifs verts et luisants d'un tatouage électrique courent sous sa peau blafarde qui a depuis longtemps oublié la caresse du soleil.{/n} « Cet électrotatouage indique que je suis un {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}magos{/g} maîtrisant les sacrements de nombreuses sphères de connaissance et dûment autorisé à présider aux cérémonies d'une cathédrale-forge. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal entblößt sein Handgelenk. Die leuchtend grünen Fäden eines elektrischen Tattoos verlaufen unter der blassen Haut, die schon lang den Geschmack des Sonnenlichts vergessen hat.{/n} "Dieses Elektoo zeigt an, dass ich ein {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} bin, der die Sakramente vieler Wissensbereiche gemeistert hat und das Recht besitzt, in einer Schmiede-Kathedrale Gottesdienste abzuhalten."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exposes his wrist. The glowing green threads of an electric tattoo run under the pale skin that has long forgotten the taste of sunlight.{/n} "This electoo indicates that I am a {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} who has mastered the sacraments of many spheres of knowledge and has the right to conduct services in a forge-cathedral."

Die leuchtend grünen Fäden eines elektrischen Tattoos verlaufen unter der blassen Haut, die schon lang den Geschmack des Sonnenlichts vergessen hat.{/n} "Dieses Elektoo zeigt an, dass ich ein {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} bin, der die Sakramente vieler Wissensbereiche gemeistert hat und das Recht besitzt, in einer Schmiede-Kathedrale Gottesdienste abzuhalten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exposes his wrist. The glowing green threads of an electric tattoo run under the pale skin that has long forgotten the taste of sunlight.{/n} "This electoo indicates that I am a Magos who has mastered the sacraments of many spheres of knowledge and has the right to conduct services in a forge-cathedral."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal bileğini gösteriyor. Güneş ışığının tadını çok uzun zaman önce unutmuş solgun teninin altındaki dövmesinden parlak yeşil çizgiler yayılıyor.{/n} "Bu elektrodövme, birçok irfan katmanının ayininde ustalaşmış bir {g|Encyclopedia:Magos}Magos{/g} olduğuma ve döküm katedralinde hizmet etme hakkını elimde bulundurduğuma işaret etmekte."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal exposes his wrist.
